text: @AlexBerenson The CDC says for every 1 case we identified, there were at least 10 we didn’t.  Fauci claimed yesterday the US would see 100,000 cases per day. Do the math.  We have been well over his number for some time.  We are now identifying those by testing people who aren’t ill.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain
